page.title: 11OUR SPARE TIME
page.content: In our spare time we play with our { {Care Bears}. With our friends we make potions by soaking petals and leaves in a bowl of water. It brings out the colour and smells sweet. We like having spare time to make things. We are in Trowbridge{swimming club}. We {read }Silver Brumby books by Elaine Mitchell. We watch {television }and our favourite programmes are "Cats' eyes", "A - team" ,"Dallas" and "Wonder woman" .I{trampoline}on Wednesdays at Frome Sports Centre . We go to {Brownies}on Tuesdays. I am Hilary -age 9- and Charlotte is 10. We have both taken our {Cycling {Proficiency}test at school. Our parents kindly take us to all these things and fetch us . Often they share transport.
